abstract: A new sports drink brand, Accelerade, will battle Gatorade and Powerade for the hearts and mouths of thirsty athletes.
snippet: A new sports drink brand, Accelerade, will battle Gatorade and Powerade for the hearts and mouths of thirsty athletes.
lead_paragraph: THE competitive — and lucrative — category of sports drinks is getting more crowded as the third-biggest beverage marketer behind Coke and Pepsi introduces a brand to battle Gatorade and Powerade for the hearts and mouths of thirsty athletes and the legions of would-be jocks.

headline.main: Cadbury Bets on Protein to Promote Its New Sports Drink
headline.print_headline: Cadbury Bets on Protein to Promote Its New Sports Drink
